name: Nightmare: Worlds Collide
description:
Nightmare: Worlds Collide is a unique horror experience that follows Jessica Redford as she recalls her memories after a horrific event causes her to lose touch with reality. Throughout the experience you will be unravelling the mystery as she tries to escape her dark inner secrets.

The game consists of three playable levels and two unique cutscene environments to expand the narrative. The game contains a flashlight mechanic which goes hand in hand with our battery system. The levels are designed to encourage exploration as each level expands depending on how much you explore. Throughout your journey you will also encounter special events which will further expand the levels to create a more immersive experience.

key Features


  • A short thrilling horror experience: Are you ready to uncover the dark secrets which haunt Jessica Redford?
  • Immersive Graphics: High quality graphics portraying dark environments.
  • Unprecedented jump scares: Who knows what might be lurking around the corner…
  • Immersive flashlight and battery system.
  • The more you explore the more you will discover.
